explains: n. 逃走；逃跑；短假；适合旅行的地方

sentences.en: The getaway car was dumped near the motorway.
sentences.cn: 那辆逃亡的小汽车被丢弃在高速公路附近。

sentences.en: They made their getaway on a stolen motorcycle.
sentences.cn: 他们骑上一辆偷来的摩托车逃掉了。

sentences.en: Weekend tours are ideal for families who want a short getaway.
sentences.cn: 周末旅行对于想要短期休假的家庭来说非常理想。
